Define Documentation

#define AP2N   mxpad.aprintf

Asyncronous notepad output:

Will printf to MXPAD ... example AP2N("Hello int var=%d\r\n", var);
Will printf to memory buffer, and output from a separate thread Fast!

#define C2N   mxpad.ClearNotepad

Clear MXPAD example ... C2N();

#define P2N   mxpad.printf

Prints like printf to the debug pad application (MxPad).

This little class acts just like TRACE, except it prints to the Mxpad application. cc

Use: P2N("printf compatible text\r\n", variables);

PrintF to MXPAD ... example P2N("Hello int var=%d\r\n", var);

The following defines are available:

Remarks:
PrintF to MXPAD ... example P2N("Hello int var=%d\r\n", var);
